ItemTooltips.phase_boots: XBOCT prefers Phase Boots, but I think you have enough damage without them.
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: You can skip this if there are no stuns in the enemy team.
ItemTooltips.monkey_king_bar: For some extra damage and mini bashes.
ItemTooltips.basher: Good if there are any carrys that can kill you easily for example Lone Druid.
ItemTooltips.bfury: You can skip this if you feel like you don't need AOE.
ItemTooltips.invis_sword: For good stuns and early game escaping.
ItemTooltips.maelstrom: Early game item, gives you nice attack speed and some AOE. Can be built later in a Mjiolnir.
ItemTooltips.abyssal_blade: Upgrade the Basher later into an Abyssal Blade.

AbilityTooltips.alchemist_acid_spray: You can farm the easy camps with this.
AbilityTooltips.alchemist_unstable_concoction: Remember when you want to gank someone start the stun in the fog so they don't hear that sound.
AbilityTooltips.alchemist_chemical_rage: Always use it in the jungle.
